content:
Dropping this link over here regarding the testing of different test vectors regarding P2P and the plan to add regression tests to them:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@marioevz/testing-the-blobs
Most of them are based on what Teku did with the evil teku implementation but we can expand to e.g. good-blobs-bad-timing, etc.
The main ingredient that we are missing is the tool capable of doing all of this but we have an idea of how to implement it, however if the teams already have something that sounds like this, please do let us know because it could save a lot of time ðŸ™Œ
